abstract: Michele Bachmann dismissed the perception that her campaign was in disarray because three workers were leaving to return to work at her Congressional office.
snippet: Michele Bachmann dismissed the perception that her campaign was in disarray because three workers were leaving to return to work at her Congressional office.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES, Iowa -- Representative Michele Bachmann on Tuesday addressed the perception that her campaign had hit a rocky patch because of dwindling finances after the latest staff shakeup.

headline.main: Bachmann Says Staff Changes Were Planned
